#summary How to get involved

There are many ways to get involved with the Rowboat project.

== Become a Rowboat user ==
  * Try out Rowboat Android - either pre-built or from [Source source]
  * Give us feedback via IRC [http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=rowboat #rowboat] or the Rowboat mailing list (rowboat@googlegroups.com)
  * If you find a bug, file a tracker [http://code.google.com/p/rowboat/issues/entry item]

== Share your Rowboat knowledge ==
  * Add [http://code.google.com/p/rowboat/wiki/ Wiki] articles or edit existing topics
  * Share your knowledge on [http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=rowboat #rowboat] or [mailto:rowboat@googlegroups.com rowboat@googlegroups.com] 

== Submit code ==
  * Send your patches to the mailing list, [mailto:rowboat@googlegroups.com rowboat@googlegroups.com]
